headline: What Lennar (LEN)'s Margin-Squeezing Affordability Push Means For Shareholders
summary: Lennar recently reported mixed fourth-quarter fiscal 2025 results, with adjusted earnings falling short of expectations while total revenues came in ahead amid a challenging housing market. Management’s outlook for the first quarter of fiscal 2026 points to lower average selling prices and gross margins, underscoring the pressure affordability initiatives and market volatility are placing on profitability even as the company prioritizes consistent production and cost discipline. Next, we’ll...
